trans-unit.source: When a script reference is rendered, the ScriptReferenceEventArgs object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object that is defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance.
trans-unit.target: ScriptReferenceEventArgs 对象的脚本引用呈现时，包含<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>中定义的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object and modify it as needed.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>事件检查<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>对象，并根据需要进行修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref>包含引用在网页上的客户端脚本的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the script library.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref>包含脚本库的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object in the Script property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>脚本属性中的对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>属性时<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref>包含引用在网页上的客户端脚本的对象。
